text: St-Saphorin railway station () is a railway station in the municipality of Saint-Saphorin, in the Swiss canton of Vaud. It is an intermediate stop on the standard gauge Simplon line of Swiss Federal Railways and is served by local trains only. == Services == The following services stop at St-Saphorin: * RER Vaud: ** : hourly service between and ; one daily round-trip continues from Villeneuve to . == References == == External links == * * Category:Railway stations in the canton of Vaud Category:Swiss Federal Railways stations
title: St-Saphorin railway station
